data.title: Mathematician:Martin Edward Hellman
data.text:
Mathematician

American mathematician and cryptographer.

One of the pioneers of public-key cryptography

Inventor with Bailey Whitfield Diffie and Ralph Charles Merkle of the technique of public key cryptography.

Inventor with Bailey Whitfield Diffie of the trapdoor function.

Nationality

American

History

Born: October 2, 1945 in New York City, United States

Theorems and Definitions

Trapdoor Function (with Bailey Whitfield Diffie)

Diffie-Hellman-Merkle Key Exchange (with Bailey Whitfield Diffie and Ralph Charles Merkle)

Definitions of concepts named for Martin Edward Hellman can be found here.

Publications
